## IIncrementalCopyOperation interface

Used to specify a selection of files to copy from a specific source folder to one or more destination folders.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IIncrementalCopyOperation extends ICopyOperation 
```
**Extends:** [ICopyOperation](./heft.icopyoperation.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [onlyIfChanged?](./heft.iincrementalcopyoperation.onlyifchanged.md) |  | boolean | _(Optional)_ If true, the file will be copied only if the source file is contained in the IHeftTaskRunIncrementalHookOptions.changedFiles map. |
